title: About Sorsogon State University
question: What is Sorsogon State University?
answer: Sorsogon State University (SorSU) is a public higher education institution offering quality education in various disciplines across multiple campuses in Sorsogon Province.

title: Campuses
question: How many campuses does SorSU have?
answer: SorSU has four campuses located in Bulan, Castilla, Magallanes, and Sorsogon City (Main Campus).

title: Vision and Mission
question: What is the vision and mission of SorSU?
answer: SorSU envisions itself as a globally recognized university providing transformative education and research for sustainable development.

title: Contact Information
question: How can I contact SorSU?
answer: You can contact SorSU at info@sorsu.edu.ph or through the official website and Facebook page.

title: University History
question: When was Sorsogon State University established?
answer: SorSU was officially chartered in 2019, transitioning from Sorsogon State College to a state university.

title: Campus Facilities
question: What facilities are available in SorSU?
answer: SorSU offers modern facilities such as laboratories, libraries, Wi-Fi access, and student lounges across campuses.

title: Motto
question: What is the motto of SorSU?
answer: SorSUâ€™s motto is 'Empowering Minds, Shaping Futures.'

title: About AskSorSU
question: What is AskSorSU?
answer: AskSorSU is an AI-powered virtual assistant developed by Sorsogon State University to help students, faculty, and visitors easily access information about enrollment, admission, registrar services, and other university-related inquiries.
